title: Cisco, Nvidia team up to help companies deploy secure AI infrastructure
text: kanawatvector Cisco (NASDAQ:CSCO) and Nvidia (NASDAQ:NVDA) are collaborating to help enterprises deploy and manage secure artificial intelligence infrastructure. The companies will offer enterprises cloud-based and on-premises AI infrastructure, networking and software, including secure AI infrastructure, observable end-to-end AI solutions and access to Nvidia AI Enterprise software, which helps deploy advanced AI and generative AI workloads. The Ethernet networking-based solutions will be sold via Cisco's global channel, providing services and through partners, the companies added. The partnership has attracted customers like European cloud services provider ClusterPower to help drive data center operations with AI/ML solutions which are required for its client infrastructure and services.
